repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript contains only first two chapters of the Brahmasūtravṛtti. The commentary is written by Rāmānanda . Back guard wooden folio with 4 ruled lines. Both sides of the folio are broken. Many folio numbers are damaged due to broken leaf. 103 written in pink color on the front guard folio. Front guard folio number 21 is in pink chalk. It has wooden guard folio as support. Left margin is rough. First Blank folio has title at the centre: rāmānandasūtravṛtti prathama[dvi]tīyodhyāyaḥ and in the left margin is written vedānta. Broken leaf with number 125 is seen at the end.

msItem.title: Brahmasūtravṛtti Adhyāya 1 and 2
msItem.author: Rāmānanda
msItem.rubric: (1v 1) śrīrāma [gap of three letters due to broken folio.] ñca tvamañca ?nandasāya namāmi yadrajoyogātpāṣāṇopi sukamagāt oṃ ………..
msItem.incipit: (1v 2)………….athāto brahmajijñāseti atrāthaśabdena sādhanacatuṣṭayasampa (1v 3) tyānantaryamucyate tadyeha karmmacito loka kṣīyate evamevāmutra?rṇyacito …
msItem.explicit: (145v 7) kyāt tatvādaḥ pṛthivyādivāssaṃgacchat ityarthaḥ . abhyāso dhyāyaparisamāptyarthaḥ tantrāt sidhaśrutitāmavilaṃbanāt brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: (145v 8) iti śrībarhmasūtravṛttabandhabhāṣyaviśiṣasyā dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ adhyāyasamāptaḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu ..

support.p: Wooden guard folio. Back guard wooden folio with 4 ruled lines.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin on verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Both sides of the folio are broken. Many folio numbers are damaged due to broken leaf.

handNote.desc: Good. But some times clusters are confusing.

additions.desc: First Blank folio title at the centre: rāmānandasūtravṛtti prathama[dvi]tīyodhyāyaḥ
[ha]riḥ [o]ṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Dots are used to show partial transcription.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) śrīrāma [gap of three letters due to broken folio.] ñca tvamañca ?nandasāya namāmi yadrajoyogātpāṣāṇopi sukamagāt oṃ ………..
(1v 2) ………….athāto brahmajijñāseti atrāthaśabdena sādhanacatuṣṭayasampa (1v 3) tyānantaryamucyate tadyeha karmmacito loka kṣīyate evamevāmutra?rṇyacito …
(145v 7) kyāt tatvādaḥ pṛthivyādivāssaṃgacchat ityarthaḥ . abhyāso dhyāyaparisamāptyarthaḥ tantrāt sidhaśrutitāmavilaṃbanāt brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ
(145v 8) iti śrībarhmasūtravṛttabandhabhāṣyaviśiṣasyā dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ adhyāyasamāptaḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu ..
